mapper.select: SELECT id, kind, start_at, end_at, start_date, end_date, title FROM schedule WHERE (start_date >= #{startDate}) OR (end_date < #{endDate})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (kind, start_at, end_at, start_date, end_date, title) VALUES (#{kind}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{title})
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET kind = #{kind}, start_at = #{startAt}, end_at = #{endAt}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, title = #{title} WHERE id = #{id}
